00035 #include "details.h"

00037 /* Constructor. */
00038 Details::Details()
00039 {
00040     pthread_mutex_init(&m_mutex,NULL);
00041     m_details.reserve(1000);
00042     clear();
00043 }
00044 
00045 /* Destructor. */
00046 Details::~Details()
00047 {
00048     clear();
00049     pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_mutex);
00050 }
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Empty the m_details vector.
00054  */
00055 void Details::clear()
00056 {
00057     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00058     m_details.clear();
00059     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00060 }
00061 
00062 /*
00063  * Add a detail line to the list.
00064  * A detail line is comprised of key<space>value.
00065  *
00066  * @param line the detail line.
00067  */
00068 void Details::add(const string line)
00069 {
00070     string thisLine = line;
00071 
00072     //Remove tabs, replace with a space.
00073     size_t pos = thisLine.find("\t");
00074     while(pos != string::npos)
00075     {
00076         thisLine.replace(pos, 1, " ");
00077         pos = thisLine.find("\t");
00078     }
00079 
00080     pos = thisLine.find("\n");
00081     while(pos != string::npos)
00082     {
00083         thisLine.replace(pos, 1, " ");
00084         pos = thisLine.find("\n");
00085     }
00086 
00087     pos = thisLine.find("\r");
00088     while(pos != string::npos)
00089     {
00090         thisLine.replace(pos, 1, " ");
00091         pos = thisLine.find("\r");
00092     }
00093 
00094     pos = thisLine.find(" ");
00095     while(pos == 0)
00096     {
00097         thisLine.replace(pos, 1, "");
00098         pos = thisLine.find(" ");
00099     }
00100 
00101     //Get the position of the first whitespace.
00102     pos = thisLine.find_first_of(" ");
00103     if(pos == string::npos) return; 
00104 
00105     string key = thisLine.substr(0, pos);
00106     string value = thisLine.substr(pos+1, string::npos);
00107 
00108     //trin the spaces on the left.
00109     pos = value.find(" ");
00110     while(pos == 0)
00111     {
00112         value.replace(pos, 1, "");
00113         pos = value.find(" ");
00114     }
00115 
00116     //Add the key:value pair to the m_details map.
00117     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00118     std::pair<string, string> keyval;
00119     keyval.first = key;
00120     keyval.second = value;
00121     m_details.push_back(keyval);
00122     //m_details[key] = value;
00123     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00124 
00125 
00126     return;
00127 
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*
00131  * Add a detail key::value to the list.
00132  *
00133  * @param key the detail key.
00134  * @param value the detail value.
00135  */
00136 void Details::add(const string key, const string value)
00137 {
00138 
00139     //Add the key:value pair to the m_details map.
00140     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00141     std::pair<string, string> keyval;
00142     keyval.first = key;
00143     keyval.second = value;
00144     m_details.push_back(keyval);
00145     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00146 
00147     return;
00148 
00149 }
00150 
00151 /*
00152  * Test if a value exists by testing the key.
00153  *
00154  * @param key the key.
00155  * @return true if there is a value for this key.
00156  */
00157 bool Details::exists(string key)
00158 {
00159     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00160 
00161     for(int i = 0; i<(int)m_details.size(); i++)
00162     {
00163         std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00164         string key2 = keyval.first;
00165         if(key2.compare(key) == 0) return true;
00166     }
00167     return false;
00168 
00169 }
00170 
00171 /*
00172  * Get the number of key:value pairs in the list.
00173  */
00174 int Details::size()
00175 {
00176     return (int)m_details.size();
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*
00180  * Get the value for a key.
00181  *
00182  * @param key the key.
00183  * @return the value for the key, or empty string if it
00184  * does not exist.
00185  */
00186 string Details::getValue(string key)
00187 {
00188     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00189 
00190     string value = "";
00191 
00192     for(int i = 0; i<(int)m_details.size(); i++)
00193     {
00194         std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00195         string key2 = keyval.first;
00196         if(key2.compare(key) == 0) return (string)keyval.second;
00197     }
00198 
00199     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00200 
00201     return value;
00202 
00203 }
00204 
00205 /*
00206  * Get all values that have a key that starts with a character
00207  * substring.
00208  *
00209  * @param keyStart the substring to match with the keys.
00210  * @return a Details object filled with the key:value pairs.
00211  */
00212 Details *Details::getValueFromKeyStartsWith(string keyStart)
00213 {
00214     Details *retMap = NULL;
00215 
00216     for(int i = 0; i<(int)m_details.size(); i++)
00217     {
00218         std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00219         string key = keyval.first;
00220         if(key.compare((size_t)0, keyStart.size(), keyStart)  == 0)
00221         {
00222             if(retMap == NULL)
00223             {
00224                 retMap = new Details();
00225             }
00226             string value = m_details[i].second;
00227             retMap->add(key, value);
00228         }
00229     }
00230 
00231     return retMap;
00232 }
00233 
00234 /*
00235  * Convert the key:value pairs into one string, keach key value
00236  * separated by a line ending.
00237  *
00238  * @param separator the separator to place between the key and the value.
00239  * @param lineEnd the character(s) to use as a line ending. Usually \r\n.
00240  * @param maxLineLength the maximum length of a line.
00241  * @return the resulting multi line string.
00242  */
00243 string Details::toString(const string separator, const string lineEnd, int maxLineLength)
00244 {
00245     string retString = "";
00246     bool first = true;
00247 
00248     for(int i = 0; i<(int)m_details.size(); i++)
00249     {
00250         std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00251         string key = keyval.first;
00252         string value = keyval.second;
00253 
00254         if(first == true) first = false;
00255         else retString += lineEnd;
00256 
00257         string line = key + separator + value;
00258         line = line.substr((size_t)0, (size_t)maxLineLength);
00259         retString += line;
00260     }
00261 
00262     return retString;
00263 
00264 }
00265 
00266 /*
00267  * Get a key:value pair from the list base of the index in the list.
00268  *
00269  * @param i the index into the list.
00270  * @return the key:value pair. Will be "null":"null" if the index
00271  * is invalid.
00272  */
00273 std::pair<string, string> Details::get(int i)
00274 {
00275     if(i >= (int)m_details.size())
00276     {
00277         std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00278         keyval.first = "null";
00279         keyval.second = "null";
00280         return keyval;
00281     }
00282     std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00283     return keyval;
00284 }
00285 
00286 /*
00287  * Get the character length of the longest key in the list.
00288  *
00289  * @return the character length of the longest key in the list.
00290  */
00291 int Details::getMaxKeyLength()
00292 {
00293     int len = 0;
00294 
00295     for(int i = 0; i<(int)m_details.size(); i++)
00296     {
00297         std::pair<string, string> keyval = m_details[i];
00298         string key = keyval.first;
00299         size_t thisSize = key.size();
00300         if((int)thisSize > len) len = (int)thisSize;
00301     }
00302 
00303     return len;
00304 
00305 }
